metadata.name: SpiderMod+
metadata.description:
SpiderMod+ gives the effect of spider mod constantly without the need for the item.
If the player picks up the spider mod item this mod will automatically disable and just use the default spidermod item behaviour.
Configuration options for this mod will be coming out in the future to customise the behaviour of the health and text (and if to show them on bosses for example)
Let me know if you encounter any issues while using!
